      • readLine

        public static String readLine(InputStream in)
                       throws IOException
        Reads from the input stream until a linefeed is encountered. All data up until that point is returned as a string. If the byte preceding the linefeed is a carriage return, that is also removed from the returned value. The stream is positioned immediately after the linefeed.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • copy

                 throws IOException
